item.title: RuneX-Gaming Best Server Ever coming over here!
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:19, topic:421209”][quote author=TheAmmoBandit link=topic=523873.msg3819689#msg3819689 date=1321664392]
Position applying for:Forum Manager - Website Dev / Client Dev (Well il explain that in a bit)
Real Name:Michaël
Ingame Name:Infection_Z
Age:16
Any Experience in this: 1Year in C+/C#, 2 years Java, 4 years HTML+JS+CSS - I’ve had my own server couple of months ago, Pk-Revolution. I know how to code PHP and how to manage forums as i am a former mod of RDC. Also was Forum Admin for old servers who closed. About Web Dev: I am following this at school as this is my main course (gonna be Multimedia/webdesigner). About Client, i make greate apps to work with RSPS Clients (look at my RSPS Client Launcher project.
Proof of old Work:I can send you my school results lol. About the client stuff: here is a screeny
Skype:Dont got one ATM
[/quote]

Accepted, Please Reply to my Private Message.[/quote]

Send an Inv.

Read full topic

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:11, topic:421209”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=523873.msg3811862#msg3811862 date=1321008811]

My Position : Forum Creator SMF
My Name: Mark
IGN: Mark
Proof: minecreaft-fourm.comuf.com
MSN/SKYPE: mark.enkababyan@hotmail.com / menkababyan

Hope I Get Accepted Because I Will Be A Really Good Forums person

Destruction-pkz

What your signature must mean?
ＳＨＵＴ ＵＰ ＡＮＤ ＥＮＪＯＹ ＴＨＥ TROLLING =)!
╭∩╮（︶︿︶）╭∩╮
And Why your rep is low?
The smf forums are created. i am currently need make an custom template.
[/quote]

Rep means nothing, it’s abused.[/quote]
It is meaning something and 11 is still low don’t you think?

[quote=“tyb97, post:10, topic:421209”][center][quote]
Position applying for: Server coder
Real Name: Tyler
Ingame Name: Tyler or tyb97
Age: 15
Any Experience in this: I am a coder with a server called pro-pk, me and baddy are doing a little work of our own, I am working on re-writing some skills atm…
Proof of old Work: Prayer I released And… I know average java, I just have not coded anything useful for RSPS lately…
Skype: Pm for it, or use my msn, its the butterfly in the corner
[/quote][/center][/quote]
Accepted but i still need so you could get an skype…
